summary: This project enhances MkDocs documentation with AI-powered features. It offers automatic article summaries, multi-AI service support, multi-language capabilities, and intelligent content cleaning. Additionally, it provides intelligent reading statistics, including character counting, code detection, and reading time estimation. The tool supports various programming languages, optimizes performance, and includes comprehensive error handling. Installation methods include direct download or Git clone, with detailed configuration steps for quick setup. The project aims to streamline documentation creation and enhance user experience.
